website_summaries.verdict: Under Armour adds a ready-to-wear everyday casual kick into its lifestyle sneaker catalog, the Street Encounter. This low-top variety is built with a lightweight canvas cover that expands and compresses easily according to the desires of the feet.Its simple façade cannot be underestimated as many consumers find it comfortable on feet. Some may have thought that its shoelaces lack springiness or its outsole short of traction, but many are drawn to its easy-to-wear and easy to style silhouette which comes at an affordable price tag.
pros: Plenty of buyers said that this is a lightweight sneaker that’s ideal for multiple lifestyle uses
A reviewer who’s been using this for six months mentioned it holds up well
A tester tried walking around and sprinting with this shoe had no negative comments about comfort and fit
One commentator mentioned it is ridiculously comfortable
Lots of reviewers commended the quality and manner by which this shoe was assembled
Satisfied wearers are recommending this style to other potential users
A purchaser mentioned that this is a solid product appropriate for everyday wear
Many claimed that with its good looks and comfort it is definitely worth its value
Few buyers stated that the UA Street Encounter is the best sneaker they purchased
A couple of users wear this shoe under their tailored suits for work
Some buyers went for this shoe for its simple design
cons: Some reviewers had to return this shoe as it felt half size smaller than their comfortable fit
Its bungee cord is a disappointment for one wearer as it does not stretch much
A buyer with high arches had a hard time getting the shoe on
Its outsole does not have strong grip, few wearers mentioned

customer_reviews.title: Looks Cheap!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look super cute in the photos but in person they look cheap and like they came from the dollar store. They also run super small. I normally wear a size 7 and that’s what I ordered. I could barley get my foot in. These are definitely not what I expected and not the same quality one expects from Under Armour. These are definitely a miss. I will be returning these ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: KimmyC

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe, but material feels rather cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to buy this product for both casual and slightly smart casual wear, but the material isn't really good for smart casual wear, so it sort of defeated my purpose for buying it. The Men's Street Encounter series are much better, and the material used also more formal and suitable for smart casual wear. Shoes are overall quite light and easy to wear, but it simply didn't fit my purposes. Would recommend for casual wear though!
customer_reviews.author: anniahsu

customer_reviews.title: Tongue makes slip on feature unhelpful
customer_reviews.text: I got these to use after hip surgery so I could just slip them on. The problem is that while my foot slips into them the shoe tongue holds back and my reacher grabber can't grasp the tongue to pull it forward. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Regan

customer_reviews.title: They're okay
customer_reviews.text: Honestly these feel like plastic. They're super cute but not very comfortable. They're nice to slip on to go out quick but I would never wear them for more than an hour or two because my feet would be torn up and killing me.
customer_reviews.author: Mj R.

customer_reviews.title: Love UA!
customer_reviews.text: Love them so much bought a second pair. Super comfortable and fits perfect. I wear a size 8 in most shoes and these were no different.
customer_reviews.author: paulaloveshoney

customer_reviews.title: Stiff
customer_reviews.text: I had to return these because they were too small. Tight around the toes. Flat bottoms and very stiff. Maybe for someone else but not for me. I prefer shoes with cushion inside.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Broadhurst

customer_reviews.title: Not the most comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It’s not meant for walking. Very think exterior and sole
customer_reviews.author: Ss

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe. Slips on and off easy. Very padded sole. My new favorite shoe to throw on with my jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes. I am on my feet all day and walking and they are great. I love that they slip on and No ties.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Foley

customer_reviews.title: Grab N Go
customer_reviews.text: I love this little slide on and go shoes, they are great at work with Khakis as well as with jeans on the weekend. Grab N Go, love em!
customer_reviews.author: Angie Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Bed UA casual shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Have two pair. The color has a fade line on my others because I washed them. Won’t was these the same way haha!
customer_reviews.author: Leigh W.

customer_reviews.title: Cute, wish they fit, but too small. Must be made for narrow feet
customer_reviews.text: Too too small. I have wide feet, but I even had my daughter and granddaughter try them who wear a size 8, they both said they fit like a 6.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Ehrisman

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these and they fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Grace Hague

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it, bought my daughter & best friend a pair
customer_reviews.author: Brenda H.

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. Not what you would expect from Under Armour.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Morris

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I agree with the other shoppers. They are not made well at all and are not true to size
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are a little tight fitting until they get broke in.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Thompson

customer_reviews.title: ... first time wearing but stretched/loosened a bit and are perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Seemed tight the first time wearing but stretched/loosened a bit and are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Conrad Seeley

product_meta.title: Under Armour Women's Street Encounter Sneaker
product_meta.description: Stretch canvas upper provides ultimate custom fit & complete cushioning. Stretch bungee lacing system provides ease of entry built to slip the shoe on & off. Full-length die-cut EVA sockliner molds to your foot. EVA outsole for lightweight support & durable traction.
feature_bullets: Stretch canvas upper provides ultimate custom fit & complete cushioning
Stretch bungee lacing system provides ease of entry built to slip the shoe on & off
Full length die cut EVA sockliner molds to your foot
EVA outsole for lightweight support & durable traction
